about_the_game:
Summary


In the game of , you play a special investigator goes to Eke City to rescue the general kidnapped by bandits, but there are still many survivors there. You can't watch them killed by the dead. Kindness is human nature, and you have to rescue them. Of course, there will be many capable people among them to help you overcome these disgusting zombie.;

Rescue point is very important, you need to find solid objects in the city to strengthen your rescue point, to prevent the zombies from attacking you many times; sticking to and keeping your life is your most important task, otherwise everything will disappear, so you need to be careful;

More than 100 kinds of weapon equipment and props need different materials to make.
Give different badges of heroism and reverence depending on the number of killings in your battle and the number of survivors saved.

chat：
1. This game is the first game I personally made. It has been developed for 11 months. Because of other work, the development progress is somewhat slow.
2. Thank my good friend Li Nan for making two songs for me.
3. There are many ideas and ideas that will be slowly added in the days to come.
4. There is no suspension and preservation in the game. What I want to express is that if I really survive and wait for rescue in a city surrounded by zombies, I will only live once.
5. There are two endings in the game.
6. Dear players, if you have any suggestions, ideas and dissatisfaction, please tell me not to hold back!
7. Thank you!
微博：@JiMTa-积木塔
微信：daxiami86
detailed_description:
Summary


In the game of , you play a special investigator goes to Eke City to rescue the general kidnapped by bandits, but there are still many survivors there. You can't watch them killed by the dead. Kindness is human nature, and you have to rescue them. Of course, there will be many capable people among them to help you overcome these disgusting zombie.;

Rescue point is very important, you need to find solid objects in the city to strengthen your rescue point, to prevent the zombies from attacking you many times; sticking to and keeping your life is your most important task, otherwise everything will disappear, so you need to be careful;

More than 100 kinds of weapon equipment and props need different materials to make.
Give different badges of heroism and reverence depending on the number of killings in your battle and the number of survivors saved.

chat：
1. This game is the first game I personally made. It has been developed for 11 months. Because of other work, the development progress is somewhat slow.
2. Thank my good friend Li Nan for making two songs for me.
3. There are many ideas and ideas that will be slowly added in the days to come.
4. There is no suspension and preservation in the game. What I want to express is that if I really survive and wait for rescue in a city surrounded by zombies, I will only live once.
5. There are two endings in the game.
6. Dear players, if you have any suggestions, ideas and dissatisfaction, please tell me not to hold back!
7. Thank you!

short_description: Human infections with evolutionary diseases have led to near-extinction. In order to reproduce, human cloning experiments have been carried out, but accidents have occurred. As an investigator, you need to save the survivors of the city and investigate the truth of the accident, build defensive fortifications or towers to resist the...
